##### About Me
I'm an economic/data analyst at the Department of Education (Australian Government). I completed my Bachelor of Economics minoring in [Econometrics](https://programsandcourses.anu.edu.au/2023/minor/emet-min) and Bachelor of Science majoring in [Quantitative Environmental Modelling](https://programsandcourses.anu.edu.au/2023/major/quem-maj) and minoring in [Applied Statistics](https://programsandcourses.anu.edu.au/2023/minor/apst-min) from the Australian National University in 2023.
